original: 01308 atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat/

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /

original: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: ye uttara pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgādanī vālukā upameṣu loka dātuṣu sarva buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāḥ andhāḥ te mama anubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyani iti prajñāpāramitāyām

original: evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyante iti nagnāś

original: cailāni pratilapsyanta iti jighatsitāḥ sattvāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhviṣyantīti apāyopapannāś

original: ca sattvāḥ sarvāpāyebhyo vimokṣyante manuṣyātmabhāvañ ca pratilapsyante iti duḥśīlān
